pages.text: Pressing $(k:wardance.combat) activates and deactivates combat mode. A pretty cosy and strongly modded Hud displaying Combat mode features.
pages.title: Combat Mode: Hud

pages.text: In War Dance to utilize a number of features $(o)(and also as precaution of accidental misfires of such mechanics)$() you must activate $(thing)"Combat mode"$(). Combat mode also allows you to see a number of new resource bars including Might, Spirit, Posture + Evasion + Fractures, rank strength and skill cooldowns (not pictured). $(br2)Outside of combat mode mechanics such as $(o)variable sweeping attacks, skill usage, offhand swinging and resource meter displays$() are supressed. However Parrying and related posture mechanics will remain active (resources will also continue to restore or be contributed to as normal also despite being hidden).$(br2)
